titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious letter to the Parliament of Scotland. William R.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.
Tweeddale, John Hay, Marquess of, 1626?-1697.
Johnston, James, 1655-1737.
Scotland. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
"Given at our court at Kensington, the 17th day of April, 1695"--P. 2.
Includes The Speech of John Marquis of Tweeddale, His Majesties High Commissioner, to the Parliament of Scotland, on Thursday the ninth of May, 1695 (p. 3-4).
Reproduction of original in the Sutro Library.
